sentences.en: A person from whom one is descended , especially if more remote than a grandparent; a forebear.
sentences.cn: 繁衍后代的人, 特别是远于祖父辈; 前辈.

sentences.en: Just 8 % of grandparents who help with child care receive any pay , the 500 - grandparent survey shows.
sentences.cn: 上述对500位祖父母的调查显示,只有8%的帮助照看孙辈的祖父母得到过经济补偿.

sentences.en: Let's Talk About Living With a Grandparent.

sentences.cn: 我的祖父母住在萨塞克斯郡。

sentences.en: Now a lot of photos and original manuscripts are exhibiting in her grandparent's house.
sentences.cn: 现在,在她的祖居中展出了许多她的照片和原稿.

sentences.en: One day, we both decided to take a road trip to her grandparent's house.
sentences.cn: 所以我们特意选了一天去她祖父祖母的房子看望他们.

sentences.en: Reserving the kids'grandparent time for fun affords a more comfortable distance, Ms. Pelton says.
sentences.cn: 佩尔顿女士说,所谓距离产生美感, 只让祖父母陪伴孩子玩耍,能让我们自在很多.

sentences.en: She was my last living grandparent and I was her only grandchild.
sentences.cn: 她是我祖辈中最后一位离世的,我是她惟一的外孙.

sentences.en: The grandparent of this word is the Latin statutes which simply means something'set up.
sentences.cn: 在祖父母的这个词是拉丁美洲的章程这只是意味着什么'成立.

sentences.en: The three children have been sponging on their grandparent for over ten years.
sentences.cn: 10多年来这3个孩子一直靠他们的姥爷、姥姥养活.

sentences.en: They are often a grandparent or an aunt or uncle.
sentences.cn: 他们的监护人通常是祖父母或叔叔阿姨.

sentences.en: This the door for a discussion of any feelings the grandparent might have on the topic.
sentences.cn: 这样,如果祖父母在报酬问题上有任何感受,双方都可以坦诚相谈.

sentences.en: We went to our grandparent's place for a short visit.
sentences.cn: 我们去祖母家呆了一会儿.

trans.tran_cn: 祖父或祖母，外祖父或外祖母
trans.tran_en: one of the parents of your mother or father
one of the parents of your mother or father
